Â· Friday, May 22nd will be the official last day of school for all Galion City School students.
Due to the COVID-19 Closure, the last grading period of this year will use Pass/No Pass.Â

p.span: On May 27th starting at 6:00am you can drive up to either the Primary or Intermediate buildings to pick up your students' belongings. There will be no need to get out of your car.Â Just pull up in front of the building and tell us the child's name.Â A bag with your chid's name will be ready with Spring Pictures if purchased, their supplies, and grade cards.Â All school fees must be paid in full in order to get the grade card. Within the grade card you will find out the student's teacher for next school year along with a new supplies list.
If you have any library books, plan to bring them and turn them in at this time too. You will be charged for missing library books.Â
If not already paid, school fees for the 2019-2020 school year must be paid in full in order to receive your final grade card.
